weaponProfile.title: Big Henry
weaponProfile.cost: Priceless (Can only be won in combat)
weaponProfile.specialAbility: Heavy attacks cannot be blocked and have a 100% chance to stagger enemies, including mini-bosses. A fully charged heavy attack creates a ground-shaking shockwave that can knock down nearby enemies. Defeating an enemy with a heavy attack grants a temporary, massive boost to armor and damage resistance.

keyRelationships.nemesis: Gunnar 'The Razor' Hansen (Wraiths | Pit Champion). Gunnar is a Badlands pit-fighting legend and one of the few brawlers to have ever fought Sasquatch to a standstill in his prime. He was the original owner of the industrial hammer's core component before she defeated him and claimed it. He sees 'Big Henry' not just as a weapon, but as a stolen part of his own legend and a symbol of his only defeat. He is obsessed with a rematch and reclaiming the hammer to prove he is the true alpha.
keyRelationships.creator: Sasquatch (Leader of the Animals)

legendaryOrigin.objective: A young, ambitious Animal champion known as Sasquatch challenged the then-reigning Badlands pit-fighter, Gunnar 'The Razor' Hansen, for his title and his prized weapon—a massive, industrial hydraulic hammer.
legendaryOrigin.client: The Animal Gang (A bid for dominance)
legendaryOrigin.outcome: A legendary, bare-knuckle brawl that became the founding myth of the modern Animals. After a brutal, hour-long fight that shattered bones and broke chrome, Sasquatch emerged victorious. She didn't just take Gunnar's title; she claimed his hammer as a trophy. She then reforged it, adding the serrated plating and the internal piston, transforming it from a simple tool into 'Big Henry'—the signature weapon that would become her scepter.
legendaryOrigin.mercFate: N/A. This was a defining event in the history of the Animals, not a mercenary gig. Gunnar Hansen was disgraced but survived, his rage and desire for a rematch festering for years.
legendaryOrigin.mercFeedback: 'They say you could hear the impacts from a mile away. Not a fight between two people, but two forces of nature. When Sasquatch lifted that hammer, she wasn't just a champion anymore; she was a queen. She didn't just win a fight; she forged a crown.' - An old Animals legend.
legendaryOrigin.payout: The leadership of the Animals and the creation of a legend.
legendaryOrigin.reputationImpact: This event established Sasquatch as the undisputed alpha of the Animals and turned 'Big Henry' into a symbol of her power. It is more than a weapon; it is her crown, a constant reminder to all that her rule was earned through blood, sweat, and sheer, unadulterated strength. It also created a bitter and powerful rival in Gunnar, who waits for the day he can claim it back.

designAndMaterials.materials: The core of 'Big Henry' is a repurposed hydraulic press piston from a scrapped Militech 'Behemoth' combat mech, giving it its immense weight and devastating impact force. The head is encased in serrated, scavenged armor plating. The haft is a reinforced steel girder, wrapped in synth-leather for grip.
designAndMaterials.ammunitionType: N/A. The weapon's only fuel is the raw, untamed strength of its wielder.

compatibleMods.description: This unique, non-replicable modification is the source of the weapon's legendary status. The perfectly balanced, master-forged construction allows for a more powerful shockwave and a longer-lasting armor bonus on kill.

weaponPhilosophy.concept: The Jawbreaker is the physical embodiment of the Animals' philosophy: might makes right. It is a weapon that rejects subtlety, speed, and technology in favor of pure, unadulterated kinetic force. Its purpose is not to wound, but to shatter. It solves every problem—armor, shields, cover, cyberware—with the same brutal, simple answer. It is a statement that in a world of complex chrome and digital ghosts, nothing is more absolute than a ton of angry steel crashing down on your enemy.

manufacturingIntel.creatorReputation: The Forgemasters of the Animals are the strongest members of the pack. Sasquatch, as the Alpha, is the ultimate Forgemaster. 'Big Henry' is her personal creation, a unique masterwork that she forged herself from the spoils of her greatest victory.
manufacturingIntel.developmentHistory: 'Big Henry' is a one-of-a-kind legendary weapon. The other 'Jawbreakers' used by Animal heavies are crude imitations, powerful but lacking the perfect balance, raw power, and historical significance of the original. Sasquatch's hammer is not just the best; it's the first.

strengths: Incredible single-hit damage, capable of neutralizing most enemies in one blow.
Guaranteed stagger effect on heavy attacks makes it excellent for breaking an enemy's guard.
The area-of-effect shockwave and armor bonus on kill make it ideal for solo crowd control.
Extremely durable and requires almost no maintenance.
weaknesses: Painfully slow attack speed leaves the user wide open for long periods.
Extremely heavy, significantly reducing movement speed and stamina regeneration.
Has zero utility for stealth or any situation that doesn't involve direct, brutal confrontation.
Possession of this weapon will make you the sworn enemy of Gunnar Hansen and his Wraith pit-fighters.
tacticalAssessment.recommendedRoles: Juggernaut, Brawler, Tank, Crowd Control Specialist.
tacticalAssessment.masteryArchetype: An 'Alpha Predator' build. A user who has completely forgone speed for pure strength and resilience. Paired with a Berserk OS, Gorilla Arms, and cyberware that enhances health and armor, the ideal user doesn't block or dodge. They wade into the thick of a fight, soak up damage, and answer every problem with a single, earth-shattering swing.

acquisitionIntel.marketAvailability: Unique. 'Big Henry' is a crown, not a commodity. It cannot be sold.
acquisitionIntel.rumoredLocation: It is the signature weapon and symbol of office for Sasquatch, the leader of the Animals. It never leaves her side. The only way to acquire this weapon is to challenge her for the leadership of the Animals in a one-on-one fight to the death and win. To hold 'Big Henry' is to be the Alpha.

crewSynergyAssessment.analysis: Big Henry is not a team weapon; it is the team's anchor. Its wielder is the unkillable center of the firefight, drawing all enemy aggression. Their role is to be the ultimate 'tank,' soaking up damage and creating chaos with the shockwave and stagger effects. A successful crew will support this living bastion. A netrunner can use quickhacks like Cyberware Malfunction and Cripple Movement to make enemies easier targets for the hammer, while a sniper or gunslinger can pick off the enemies that are scattered by the shockwave. Its role is to be the immovable wall against which the enemy breaks.
